content: अंबरं [अंबः शब्दः तं राति धत्ते, रा-क] {@--1@} Sky, atmosphere, ether; तावतर्जयदंबरे <ls>R. 12. 41.</ls> {@--2@} Cloth, garment, clothing, apparel, dress; दिव्यमाल्यांबरधरं <ls>Bg. 11. 11</ls>; <ls>R. 3. 9</ls>; दिगंबर; सागरांबरा मही the sea-girt earth. {@--3@} Saffron. {@--4@} Talc. {@--5@} A kind of perfume (Ambergris). {@--6@} Cotton. {@--7@} <ab>N.</ab> of a people. {@--8@} Circumference, compass. {@--9@} Neighbourhood, surrounding country (<ls>Nir.</ls>). {@--10@} Lip. {@--11@} Evil, sin. {@--12@} Destroyer of elephants (नागभिद् <ls>Trik.</ls>)
